pinyin: Guo2 jia1 Wai4 hui4 Guan3 li3 ju2

sentences.english: This is a foreign exchange trader direct experience.
sentences.chinese: 这是一个外汇交易的直接经验。

sentences.english: A foreign party is encouraged to deposit in the Bank of China any part of foreign exchange which he is entitled to remit abroad.
sentences.chinese: 鼓励外国合营者将可汇出的外汇存入中国银行。

sentences.english: Don't even think about the trillion-plus dollars in foreign exchange reserves.
sentences.chinese: 甚至不要再想那一万亿以上的外汇储备了。

sentences.english: Interestingly, forex markets haven't followed equities into this risk-off mode.
sentences.chinese: 有意思的是，外汇市场并未跟随股市进入避险模式。

sentences.english: Joint ventures shall not pay foreign currency or foreign exchange certificate to the aforesaid establishments.
sentences.chinese: 不得向合营企业收取外币或外汇兑换券。

sentences.english: Offenses involving the provision of Renminbi funds with the knowledge of fraudulent purchase of foreign exchange shall be punished as an accomplice.
sentences.chinese: 明知用于骗购外汇而提供人民币资金的，以共犯论处。

sentences.english: Data on China's pattern of foreign-exchange purchases is less reliable.
sentences.chinese: 中国外汇购买方面的数据则没这么可靠。

sentences.english: Foreign exchange security deposit bargain is 42 stir thousand catty develop a financial product.
sentences.chinese: 描述外汇保证金交易是四两拨千斤的衍生金融产品。

sentences.english: The significance of the huge foreign-exchange reserves lies elsewhere.
sentences.chinese: 巨额外汇储备的重大意义在于其它方面。

sentences.english: So we need strengthen funds outstanding for foreign exchange management.
sentences.chinese: 由此阐述对外汇占款加强管理的必要性。

sentences.english: Controls on foreign exchange no longer limit their freedom to travel abroad.
sentences.chinese: 外汇管制再也不能限制他们出国旅行。

sentences.english: The potential impact of foreign exchange rate fluctuations on a company's profitability.
sentences.chinese: 外汇汇率的波动对公司收益性的潜在影响。

sentences.english: Individual foreign exchange business shall be managed in light of the above-mentioned classification.
sentences.chinese: 按上述分类对个人外汇业务进行管理。

sentences.english: The government didn't have enough foreign currency to bail out the banks.
sentences.chinese: 冰岛政府也没有足够的外汇储备可以用来救助银行。

sentences.english: How does a company remit its profits and dividends and repatriate capital abroad?
sentences.chinese: 该怎样向国外汇寄其利润与股息和从国外汇回资本？

sentences.english: Sagi also owns two websites for online foreign currency transactions.
sentences.chinese: 史记还拥有两家网上外汇交易网站。

pinyin: jin1 rong2 yan3 sheng1 chan3 pin3

definition: local currency/our own currency/abbr. for 本位貨幣|本位货币
abbr. for 期貨合約|期货合约[qi1 huo4 he2 yue1], futures contract (finance)
